participant_1.background:
I enjoy spending time with my pets, and I love to eat strawberries.
i like nfl and college football.
i work in car sales.
my favorite activity is fishing.
I enjoy my quiet life and green tea.

participant_2.background:
I will not force my musical taste on others, but they are welcome to listen to it if they want.
i was the first born child.
i own a french bulldog.
I don't care how I look, I'm just going to enjoy the concert with my friend.
i am the leader of the french fry research department at del taco.

content.text: Not much, just working on my french fry research.
You're the leader of the french fry research department at del taco?
Yup! It's a lot of fun.
What's your favorite part of the job?
I love being able to experiment with new flavors and textures.
That's awesome! Do you have any new flavors coming out soon?
We're actually working on a new bacon and cheese fry right now.
Yum! I love bacon and cheese.
Me too! We're also working on a new vegan fry option.
That's great! I'm sure a lot of people will be excited about that.
Well, I have to get going. It was nice talking to you!
You too! Have a great day!
